This code infers the parameters of a Hawkes process between 5 animal species from camera trap data.

## Load libraries

```{r, message = FALSE, output = FALSE}
library(here)

source(here("functions/functions_unitevents.R"))
source(here("functions/functions_plot.R"))
source(here("functions/functions_data.R"))

```

## Parameters

```{r}
# --- Inference parameters
dhours <- 6
ndays <- 1.5
gamma <- 0.5
scale <- 10e7
estimator <- "BVL"

# --- Silhouettes path
silhouettes_path <- here("data/species_silhouettes/")
labs <- c(impala = paste0("<img src='", silhouettes_path, 
                          "impala.png'", " height='20'/>", 
                          "<br>*impala*"),
          kudu = paste0("<img src='", silhouettes_path, 
                        "kudu.png'", " height='20'/>", 
                        "<br>*kudu*"),
          lion = paste0("<img src='", silhouettes_path, 
                        "lion.png'", " height='20'/>", 
                        "<br>*lion*"),
          wildebeestblue = paste0("<img src='", silhouettes_path, 
                                  "wildebeest.png'", " height='20'/>",
                                  "<br>*wildebeest*"),
          zebraburchells = paste0("<img src='", silhouettes_path, 
                                  "zebra.png'", " height='20'/>",
                                  "<br>*zebra*"))
```

## Read data

```{r}
dat <- read.csv(here("code/example_real_data/out/cleaned_data.csv"))

# Format datetimes
fmt <- "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"
dat$datetime <- as.POSIXct(dat$datetime, format = fmt)
dat$datetime <- force_tz(dat$datetime, tz = "Etc/GMT-2")

```

## Infer

```{r, results='hide'}
# --- get alphabetical species order 
spp_names <- sort(unique(dat$snapshotName))

# --- Get k and delta
delta <- dhours/24 # delta in days
k <- round(ndays/delta, 0) # k from delta and dmax

# --- Infer
inf <- infer(dat, 
             k = k, delta = delta,
             gamma = gamma, scale = scale)
# If the error:
# Erreur dans NeuroCorr_SetParallel(threads) : 
#   impossible de trouver la fonction "NeuroCorr_SetParallel"
# appears, restart R, re-load packages and re-run
```

### Plot interactions

```{r interactions, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
# --- Format inferred model
u_inf <- unpack_inf(inf, 
                    species_names = spp_names, 
                    k = k, delta = delta)


plt_ue <- ue_model_to_df(u_inf[[estimator]])

# --- Plot
plot_interactions(plt_ue,
                  scale = "hours", 
                  silhouettes = labs,
                  textsize = 12,
                  timestep = 12,
                  ystep = 0.2,
                  separate_self = TRUE)

# Export plot
ggsave(here("code/example_real_data/figures/interactions.jpeg"),
       bg = "white",
       width =  8, height = 8,
       dpi = 600)
```

### Plot background rates

```{r background_rates, fig.width=6, fig.height=4}
# --- Plot
plot_background_rate(ue_df = plt_ue,
                     title = "Background rates",
                     textsize = 9,
                     write_label = TRUE,
                     silhouettes = labs)

# Export plot
ggsave(here("code/example_real_data/figures/background_rates.jpeg"),
       bg = "white",
       width =  6, height = 4,
       dpi = 600)
```
